poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
If it walked onstage in a pantomime
You'd all scream look out behind you
And I'd say what? Look out behind you! What?
Look out! oh that - it's just a pirate ship
No, sorry, it's a yak. See? Yank its tail
For a mug of salty, hot yak-butter tea.
What do you mean you don't like yak-butter tea?
